name: PureKFD
subtitle: The Purest iOS Toolbox
localizedDescription: PureKFD is an exploit-based jailed package manager supporting iOS versions 14.0 through 18.0/18.1b4. It utilizes SparseRestore CVE-2024-44252, KFD CVE-2023-41974, and MDC CVE-2022-46689 to allow users to customize their experience through a user-friendly interface.

versions.localizedDescription: PureKFD is an exploit-based jailed package manager supporting iOS versions 14.0 through 18.0/18.1b4. It utilizes SparseRestore CVE-2024-44252, KFD CVE-2023-41974, and MDC CVE-2022-46689 to allow users to customize their experience through a user-friendly interface.

privacy.DocumentsFolder: PureKFD uses the documents folder to store App Data
